Module com.example.organizer
Package com.bookclub.model

Class Book

java.lang.Object
com.bookclub.model.Book
public class Book extends Object
The Book class represents a book in the book club application. Each book has an id, title, author, genre, and total number of chapters. This class provides getter and setter methods for these attributes. Title, author, and genre must be non-null and non-empty. The id must be greater than or equal to 1.

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author)
      Constructs a Book object with the specified title and author. Title and author must be non-null and non-empty.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the book.
      author - the author of the book.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the title or author is null or empty.

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, String genre, int totalChapters)
      Constructs a Book object with the specified title, author, genre, and total number of chapters. Title, author, and genre must be non-null and non-empty, and total chapters must be greater than 0.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the book.
      author - the author of the book.
      genre - the genre of the book.
      totalChapters - the total number of chapters in the book.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the title, author, or genre is null or empty, or if total chapters is less than or equal to 0.

    • Book

      public Book(int id, String title, String author, String genre, int totalChapters)
      Constructs a Book object with the specified id, title, author, genre, and total number of chapters. Id must be greater than or equal to 1, and title, author, and genre must be non-null and non-empty.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the book.
      title - the title of the book.
      author - the author of the book.
      genre - the genre of the book.
      totalChapters - the total number of chapters in the book.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the id is less than 1, or if the title, author, or genre is null or empty, or if total chapters is less than or equal to 0.

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
